#summary flashKeyExists(key)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ControllerRequestFunctions Controller Request Functions]

*Description*:

Checks if a specific key exists in the Flash.

*Return Type*:

Boolean

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *key* || string || true ||  || The key to check if it exists ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfif flashKeyExists("error")>
  do something...
</cfif>
}}}
